Package space.sunqian.common.net

Interface NetServer<A>

Type Parameters:
A - the type of the address in the current network
All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Subinterfaces:
TcpServer, UdpServer
public interface NetServer<A> extends Cloneable
This interface represents a network server.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    NetServer.Worker
    Represents the worker of the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    await()
    Blocks current thread until all threads of this server terminates, or interrupted via an InterruptedException.
    void
    close()
    Closes this server.
    boolean
    isClosed()
    Returns whether this server is closed.
    A
    localAddress()
    Returns the address this server is bound to.
    @Nonnull List<@Nonnull NetServer.Worker>
    workers()
    Returns all current workers of this server.

  • Method Details

    • await

      void await() throws NetException
      Blocks current thread until all threads of this server terminates, or interrupted via an InterruptedException.
      Throws:
      NetException - if any error occurs

    • close

      void close() throws NetException
      Closes this server. This method interrupts all thread of the server, and waits for all threads to terminate.
      Throws:
      NetException - if any error occurs

    • localAddress

      @Nonnull A localAddress()
      Returns the address this server is bound to.

      If the server is closed, it still returns the address at which the server was alive.

      Returns:
      the address this server is bound to

    • workers

      @Nonnull @Nonnull List<@Nonnull NetServer.Worker> workers()
      Returns all current workers of this server.
      Returns:
      all current workers of this server

    • isClosed

      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether this server is closed.
      Returns:
      whether this server is closed
